bug.author: Yancey1989
bug.summary: build sqlflow failed without Docker cache
bug.description: build SQLFLow Docker image failed without cache: <denchmark-code>> docker build -t sqlflow . --no-cache ..... # sqlflow.org/sqlflow/pkg/proto pkg/proto/Parser.pb.go:169:11: undefined: grpc.SupportPackageIsVersion6 pkg/proto/Parser.pb.go:179:5: undefined: grpc.ClientConnInterface ... </denchmark-code>
